Demonology:
Be an Occultist, a worshiper of demonic spirits.
Corrupt the world and its inhabitants, sacrifice to demonic entities, and incarnate demons into your armies.

[adventure_main]PLAYSTYLE[/]
You like nurturing units over the long term to unleash their full potential, but will happily sacrifice individual units.

Be an Occultist, a worshipper of demonic spirits.
Make offerings and lure demonic presences from the realms beyond into this world to possess and feed upon mortals.

[adventure_main]PLAYSTYLE[/]
Your demons possess mortal units and pave the way to direct incarnation through battle.
With enough bloodshed, you can craft the vessels for demons to descend onto Eo.
Demons incarnated in this vessel gain [unitpromotion]"{what}"[/].
The vessel is too weak for this recipe!
Bolster your forces with brainwashed and expendable local units.
